pageContext.claim: “Black Lives Matter leader states, ‘If U.S. doesn't give us what we want, then we will burn down this system and replace it’. This is Treason, Sedition, Insurrection!”
pageContext.analysis: Black Lives Matter is not a singular entity but an informal movement of people calling for racial justice and an end to police brutality and police killings of unarmed African Americans. Trump is generalizing to misrepresent it as a violent movement.
